subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Brad Lidge has kept booing fans at bay by being 36 for 36 in save opportunities with a 2-0 record and a 1.99 earned run average in 66 games.
snippet: Brad Lidge has kept booing fans at bay by being 36 for 36 in save opportunities with a 2-0 record and a 1.99 earned run average in 66 games.
